text: [Jod kun az] Hangome ki Alloh taolo [ʙa Iso] farmud: "Ej Iso, man turo ʙarmegiram va ʙa sūji xeş ʙolo meʙaram va turo az [oloişu tuhmati] kasone, ki kufr varzidand, pok megardonam va to rūzi rastoxez kasonero, ki az tu pajravī kardand [va ʙa Muhammad imon ovardand], ʙartar az kasone qaror mediham, ki kufr varzidand. Sipas ʙozgaştaton ʙa sūji man ast; on goh dar [mavridi] on ci dar on ixtilof mekarded, mijonaton dovarī mekunam
